content: the wooly windows crochet beanie uses two colors of wooly worsted yarn 1 to work a playful cluster stitch with little hints of color in between choose the size you need from baby to kids to adult you ll love to work this hat a few times here s the specs sizes baby teen/small adult large adult measurements 14 18 22 inches around 5 7 8 in high yarn ewe ewe wooly worsted 2 100% merino 95 yards color a 1 skein 92 wheat color b 1 skein 70 aquamarine crochet hook size j/10 6 mm supplies darning needle gauge 4 tc clusters over 4 ------------------------------------- find the ewe ewe yarn to make this project local stockists and sign up for our newsletter at www eweewe com 3 1 http //www ravelry com/yarns/library/ewe-ewe-yarns-wooly-worsted 2 http //www ravelry com/yarns/library/ewe-ewe-yarns-wooly-worsted 3 http //www eweewe com
